definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Fat A triglyceride of a long-chain carboxylic acid that is solid below 20℃.
sentences.chinese: 一种长链羧酸的甘油三酯，20℃以下为固态。

sentences.english: What would you think if one of your cells tried to patent the Krebs Cycle? Silly cells…
sentences.chinese: 当你的一个细胞要三羧酸循环的专利你怎么想？

sentences.english: The major components of acidic fraction are phenols and organic acids.
sentences.chinese: 酸性组分主要由酚类化合物和有机羧酸组成。

sentences.english: REDOX Relationships amongst Alcohols, Aldehydes and Ketones and Carboxylic acids.
sentences.chinese: 醇，醛与酮和羧酸之间的氧化还原关系。

sentences.english: Monocyclic carboxylate is a dispersive-type polymer nucleating agent.
sentences.chinese: 单环羧酸盐属于分散型聚合物成核剂。

sentences.english: In vivo camptothecin remains a balance of E-lactone form and Carboxylic salt form.
sentences.chinese: 喜树碱在体内存在内酯环形式和羧酸盐形式的平衡。

sentences.english: One exception is the decarboxylation of aromatic carboxylic acids.
sentences.chinese: 芳香羧酸进行脱羧反应是一个例外。

sentences.english: The yield of O-alkylation of 2,5-dimethylphenol with the monohalogen carboxylic esters is above 81%.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯酚与一卤代羧酸酯的反应产率在81%以上。

sentences.english: The scheme initially involves acylation of thiophene using a carboxylic acid to afford the acyl thiophene.
sentences.chinese: 这条路线是先用羧酸使噻吩已酰化制得酸基噻吩。

sentences.english: Discussed initially the mechanism of polycarboxylic water-reducer improve performance of cracking-resistance of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了聚羧酸减水剂提高混凝土抗劈裂性能机理。

sentences.english: The resistance of green peach aphids to insecticides results mainly from the enhance the levels of the E4 carboxylesterase.
sentences.chinese: 桃蚜的抗药性主要是由羧酸酯酶E4扩增引起的。

sentences.english: Usually, HEDP is used together with polycarboxylic acid.
sentences.chinese: 通常与聚羧酸型阻垢分散剂配合使用。

sentences.english: Europium and terbium rare earth complexes with tetracarboxylic acid were successfully prepared in aqueous solution.
sentences.chinese: 在水溶液中合成了铕和试的四元羧酸稀土配合物。

sentences.english: Performance characteristics of self-prepared polycarboxylic acid formaldehyde free non-ironing finishing agent PC was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨自制聚羧酸型无甲醛免烫整理剂PC的应用性能。

sentences.english: The esterification mechanism of unsaturated carboxylic acid was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了不饱和羧酸酯化反应的机理。

sentences.english: Linen fabric was treated with formaldehyde-free easy-care finishing agent which was polymerized from polycarboxylic acids.
sentences.chinese: 采用多元羧酸聚合型无醛免烫整理剂处理亚麻织物。

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
